pages.title: Washed Hide
pages.text: $(item)Washed Hides$() can be produced using a variety of methods.$(p)$(info) $(item)Scraped Hides$() can be washed by placing them in water for a while.$(p)$(info) Alternatively, $(item)Scraped Hides$() can be washed instantly with a bucket of water.
$(info) $(item)Scraped Hides$() can also be cleaned by $(thing)soaking$() them in water over a $(item)Campfire$().
